definition: placing in medical care in a hospital
details:
noun
- placing in medical care in a hospital
= synonyms: hospitalisation, hospital care
- insurance that pays all or part of a patient's hospital expense
= synonyms: hospitalization insurance
- the condition of being treated as a patient in a hospital
= example: the condition of being treated as a patient in a hospital
- a period of time when you are confined to a hospital
= example: a period of time when you are confined to a hospital
